channel.title: Setting a key, value inside mistral workflow
channel.description:
Can I set a key, value inside mistral workflow without calling out the st2client? (I didn't see this in the source for mistral under [stackstorm source for mistral st2kv](https://github.com/StackStorm/st2mistral/blob/master/st2mistral/functions/stackstorm.py)
Cheers,
Peter

item.title: Setting a key, value inside mistral workflow
item.dc:creator: petergits
item.description:
Thanks, I will git that a try right away. Appreciate the quick response.

Read full topic
item.source: Setting a key, value inside mistral workflow

item.title: Setting a key, value inside mistral workflow
item.dc:creator: armab
item.description:
You can use the st2 integration pack inside the Mistral workflow which has st2kv datastore operators.

See documentation: GitHub - StackStorm-Exchange/stackstorm-st2: StackStorm pack management

Read full topic
